title: Sample Book Of Ribbons, 1920–30
inscribed: Stamped on inside of front cover:  "H. A. Elsberg 51 East 57th Street New York".
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Herman A. Elsberg
description: Book with paper leaves bound in black cloth covers: 39 pages show samples of silk ribbon in various colors; 4 pages show single samples of silk ribbon; 12 pages show samples of velvet ribbon in various colors and widths.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book Of Ribbons, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: paper, silk. Gift of the Estate of Herman A. Elsberg. 1941-35-3.
